<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// RewriteBuffer - As code is rewritten, SourceBuffer&#39;s from the original</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// input with modifications get a new RewriteBuffer associated with them.  The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// RewriteBuffer captures the modified text itself as well as information used</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to map between SourceLocation&#39;s in the original input and offsets in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// RewriteBuffer.  For example, if text is inserted into the buffer, any</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// locations after the insertion point have to be mapped.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/rewritebuffer"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/rewritebuffer">RewriteBuffer</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
